snippet: A new video released by detectives late on Wednesday is said to show the abductor of a slain Hasidic real estate developer lying in wait hours before the crime.
abstract: Video released by New York City Police Dept is said to show abductor of slain Hasidic real estate developer Menachem Stark lying in wait hours before the crime; Stark's body was discovered one day after he disappeared from Williamsburg, Brooklyn, smoldering in a trash container on Long Island; case has gripped Williamsburg's Hasidic community.
lead_paragraph: A new video released by detectives late on Wednesday is said to show the abductor of a slain Hasidic real estate developer lying in wait hours before the crime.

headline.main: Video Said to Show Brooklyn Abduction Suspect
headline.print_headline: Video Said to Show Brooklyn Abduction Suspect
